mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_queue( account_id, student_email, student_name, student_phone, student_gender, student_birth, student_address_main, student_address_sub ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{studentEmail}, #{studentName}, #{studentPhone}, #{studentGender}, #{studentBirth}, #{studentAddressMail}, #{studentAddressSub} )
